Author: Sphere_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: Hello everyone.  Yes, we are alive.  No, we are not abandoning bitcointalk.  You're right in that we've been active in other communication channels and not as much here - and we apologize for the silence.  We've been quite preoccupied with the other aspects of our ICO.  Attempting to capitalize on the recent Facebook scandal without a plan would've been a misstep and a misapplication of our resources.  We could still potentially use it to our advantage, but there are other matters that take priority at this time.  Right now, the devs have been largely focused on tackling bugs and the issue of monetization. As well as economics for the token.  Meanwhile us members of the marketing team have been busy applying to many different exchanges that are big and small. It's been a very rewarding learning process because we're getting to know the industry more, as well as many of the different standards across the industry when it comes to listing a token.  We've been making many small changes to the site, such as the news portal and web application.  The web application is actually still available. Here is the link to the page: https://sphere.social/hello/  Token distribution will take priority for the time being since we're doing it manually, one by one.  So we ask that if you're a supporter of our project, please remember to enable custom tokens on your ERC20 wallet. Many of our users actually haven't added their address yet.  We are pleased to say that we are making some progress on getting on a larger exchange as opposed to a smaller one.  The market has changed, there is no denying that.  But it hasn't and will not hinder us from moving forward and continuing development. Markets change, and so will we.  Right now, giving back to our supporters is our number one priority.  For April, we are focused on fostering growth and substantive development for our network.  That is why in the very near future, we plan on announcing a closed beta for a new feature that will become available sometime later this month for the app.  The ICO will end April 9th as planned. Afterwards we will shift our marketing strategy.

Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users

Decentralization does not prevent data harvesting, or rather I should say, it does not prevent people from sharing their intimate data.

Author: Rigorous
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: I am far from a fan of Facebook but people really have no brains anymore, do they? They document their whole life on there, even though they have been warned against that. They treat everything on Facebook as truth, completely devoid of critical thinking.  Facebook's whole business model is based on selling personal data and now people are surprised their personal data is ... used? Body: Affiliate programs, no matter where they are used, are all the same... people get rewarded for bringing more people into the project. And... I'm not that pro for this kind of rewarding, because a lot of bigger whales will gain profit on this... some whales are part of groups that make large investments, grabbing a lot of affiliate bonusses and then they leave the project, causing it to dump fast... I'm more a fan of investment bonusses... this way you only get the reward when you actualy invest own money in it. If you invested in a project, you already stated you believe in it and you trust it to return a good revenue on investment.

Author: Deylandra
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: To the Sphere folks, I really want to invest in your ICO because I hate Facebook with a passion, lol.  And Sphere is actually a great name which is important and will give this platform an edge over other decentralized Facebook's coming out.  What I need to know before investing is:  1) Is Sphere actually (going to be) decentralized? Is the entire software going to be hosted on Ethereum (or a blockchain) or is it just the token hosted on Ethereum while the software is run on a central server? 2) Since a successful Social Network will require a lot of transactions per second, how will it scale if it's successful? What happens if Ethereum is unable to scale quickly enough in the future? 3) How is the governing of Sphere going to be decentralized? Will there by a constitution? Will there be voting? Who will get to vote? Or will Sphere the company still control it in the future thereby it won't truly be decentralized?  From what I understand about Steemit:  1) It is actually entirely on a blockchain. 2) The governing is decentralized and the founder has moved on/lost control. 3) It can scale.  If we are just replacing one centralized Facebook with another centralized Facebook that happens to pay users in crypto currency, it's still a big advantage/improvement over Facebook.  However, I would think a truly decentralized Facebook like Steemit that no one controls would outcompete Sphere over time. Thus I'd rather save my ICO money for that if/when it comes out. A big problem however, is that there really are a limited number of GOOD NAMES for social networks. Sphere happens to be a great name. It could pose a threat to Facebook if done right and truly decentralized.

Body: What I don't understand about this project is how it can run on Ethereum?  Steemit can do 100k transactions a second and Ethereum can do like 15 per second.  Assuming Sphere uses a tenth of Ethereum's capacity, then Sphere can do like 1.5 transactions per second versus Steemit's 100,000k per second?  Is my math wrong or what am I missing?  Do you need Ethereum gas to do anything on Sphere? Shouldn't Sphere realistically be be built on Eos or Neo or a blockchain that scales? Author: saintkamei
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: In my opinion Steemit is a sad commentary of how fraudulent cryptospace can be. Had to look really hard for good topics or blogs. The reward system or steem power has rendered a group of people so powerful that the contents in the eco system has become monopolised. Bitcointalk, on the other hand, is a better goose in terms of functionality. That the admins are proactive in removing spammers is laudable but yes the interface looks dated. Now, I have explored several community/forum cms with great functions and UIs. But they are not as powerful as simplemachine cms this forum is based on and the load on the server with so many users will be enormous. This dated look here is because the admins have deliberately made the choice of prioritizing performance over aesthetics. If they wanted, they can migrate the whole thing in 24 hours to a better looking CMS but that's not the answer, is it?

Author: wiserico
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: Sphere Social has been added to WISERICO tracker    Vote for the  Sphere Social on WISERICO and follow Sphere Social on the  media platforms:  Telegram Twitter Facebook Medium   Sphere is a Decentralized Social Network platform that offers an integrated, decentralized market, complete with its own advertising platform. Unlike other social media juggernauts that sell your online privacy to the highest bidder. Sphere empowers its users to take back profits these companies make from selling your data. We introduce the Social Activity Token, SAT a cryptocurrency used to facilitate transactions within the Sphere Network. Users will enjoy the benefits of privacy and security. If companies want your data they will have to compensate you. Sphere is built upon the main principles of privacy and security as an undeniable right, giving each user unprecedented protection and se- curity and allowing you to connect with everyone you know safely, and most importantly, securely.  WISERICO on BITCOINTALK

The best way to do away with mindless drivel and spam would have been to do away with the ranking system itself except for moderators and admins with moderators flagging spam/users on their threads. They then can open the avatar and signature feature to all. I don't think merit system will dent the spamming contingent. Sorry...this sounds totally unrelated to sphere but the social network will also have to be vigilant. I saw hi5 and myspace become irrelevant because they couldn't manage spams.

Body: That's good thinking. On the other hand, advertisers would want to buy cheap tokens because without tokens they can't advertise. So if the value is expected to go up, you should buy now. Plus, if all other advertisers were holding onto their tokens, the one advertiser who would use their tokens to pay for an ad campaign would reach the largest audience because there would be no competitors. So in the end, I think the incentive to hold and the incentive to use the tokens will equal out and come to an equilibrium.

Author: Francewhoa
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: Quote from: Francewhoa on January 27, 2018, 03:13:37 AM  Quote I feel like you are fundamentally misunderstanding what stage of development the company is in, and even what the purpose of an ICO is.  Good point that some readers might think I was referring to a developed product, not an ICO. I updated my post accordingly to clarify that my review is about the Sphere ICO, not about a Sphere developed and released final product.  Quote You utter the words "for profit" as if they were some sort of crime.  I was not implying that. My point is that "usually" a corporation first priority is to hoard money. Not serve the users and protect their privacy. Compare to other ICO which are owned by not-for profit organization.  My point is that open source software are more secure. Because the code is available publicly. So it can not be review by the public. And open source software is usually focused on people-servant, instead of money-servant. Related video for users and buyers, about why not-for profit open source software is better for you at https://youtu.be/ZPPikY3uLIQ  How about we agree that we have different priority? Feel free to have your own priority. To each their own.   Quote Open-source has its place, and it's certainly fun for those working on it, but there are benefits to not being open-source as well- namely fast, organized decision-making, and being able to pay the experts we need to make the code work, rather than just hoping someone will come along with the expertise needed.  I founded a corporation 23 years ago. Since then we where able to achieve all of these benefits with open source software. Have you previously successfully tried a business model based on fully open source software? Again how about we agree that we have different interest about the type of software and their respective future? Please do feel really free to not use open source. To each their own.  Related video for investors, about why open source software is a better investment for you at https://youtu.be/fch9WjHjAXI

Author: Warfare
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: I don't know how many are active, but these are the total numbers posted by Sphere_Official:  Quote from: Sphere_Official on February 07, 2018, 08:27:57 PM Greetings to all Sphere Supporters!  We actually have more than 500k users that registered for SAT now.  We are glad to report our progress is growing since we are drawing closer to the ICO.  Some of our users have been inquiring about the status of the Pre-Sale as of late. So we feel obliged to shed some light on these questions.  Starting with statistics about the Sphere App.  So far, we have over 40 thousand users on the App. This generates plenty of activityâ€Šâ€”â€Šso we are pleased to report the following numbers:  There have been 27,326 photos uploaded. 606 videos shared. 384 groups created.  This is a good sign that app users are anticipating our marketplace. We also now have over 6800 community in our telegram.  Here is some data about the amount of SAT we have distributed thus far:  We have reached our minimum soft-cap as well with over 1.5 million USD raised.  Roughly 70 million SAT, or 11% of our SAT hard cap has been sold in the presale so far.  Please stay tuned for more updates.

Author: Sphere_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: Greetings to all Sphere Supporters!  We actually have more than 500k users that registered for SAT now.  We are glad to report our progress is growing since we are drawing closer to the ICO.  Some of our users have been inquiring about the status of the Pre-Sale as of late. So we feel obliged to shed some light on these questions.  Starting with statistics about the Sphere App.  So far, we have over 40 thousand users on the App. This generates plenty of activityâ€Šâ€”â€Šso we are pleased to report the following numbers:  There have been 27,326 photos uploaded. 606 videos shared. 384 groups created.  This is a good sign that app users are anticipating our marketplace. We also now have over 6800 community in our telegram.  Here is some data about the amount of SAT we have distributed thus far:  We have reached our minimum soft-cap as well with over 1.5 million USD raised.  Roughly 70 million SAT, or 11% of our SAT hard cap has been sold in the presale so far.  Please stay tuned for more updates.

Author: Francewhoa
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: This is my review of Sphere Social. Which is at https://sphere.social  Summary: Token. Weak ethic. NOT decentralized.  The good:  â€¢ Token can be exchange for services within Sphere Social (SS). In the unlikely event that itâ€™s successful. I do not trust and will not invest in SS though.  The bad:  â€¢ Sphere Social (SS) is NOT really fully decentralized. They try to fool you into believing that they are decentralized. To do so they use the popular word â€œdecentralizedâ€ all over their whitepaper. In fact SS is mostly CENTRALIZED. They claim that they are decentralized because they offer reward tokens. Which they call Social Activity Tokens (SAT). Tokens are not to confuse with a full decentralized Social Network. Sorry but those are two different things. Read on for other red flags. In other words, SS are misleading and deceiving you. This shows they have a weak ethic. When most users figure this out the value of their token will crash and users will leave. To the benefit of really decentralized Social Network. Such as https://DiasporaFoundation.org or https://Minds.com   â€¢ NOT distributed. And NOT federated. Read more about the definition of distributed and federated networks at:  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Distributed_social_network  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Federation_(information_technology)  â€¢ Sphere tried to mislead you and deceive you into beleiving that blockchain and distributed storage are the same thing. Extract from Sphere whitepaper v1.7.4 on page 19: â€œa decentralized social media platform that stores multimedia and other data on a secured blockchain rather than on traditional servers.â€ Source at https://sphere.social/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/Sphere_Whitepaper_v1.7.4.pdf  Their claim is unethical because by definition a â€œblockchainâ€ is a cryptographically secured ledger that can be permissionless and decentralized. A blockchain is NOT to confuse with a distributed storage of social multimedia and other data. In Sphere's claim above, notice that they tried to mislead you and deceive you into believing that "blockchain" and "distributed storage" are the same thing. They are not.  The above is one of the many unethical claims in the Sphere whitepaper. Did you spot the other unethical claims?  An ethical claim would be: â€œSphere stores multimedia and other data on a secured decentralized storage rather than on traditional secured centralized storage. And store its SAT tokens in on a secured blockchain.â€ Assuming that those are their real intentions.  Maybe the Sphere founders are not familiar with the most widely recognized definition of blockchain? For investors, buyers, and users interested to not getting scam by unethical abuse of words such as â€œblockchainâ€, â€œdecentralizedâ€, â€œcryptocurrencyâ€, â€œtokenâ€, a good start is to educate yourself. For example Corbett Report did an informative video about the nuances in the jargon. Very good to watch. They are good and bad crypto currencies. Educate yourself to not get scam by the bad ones. Video at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FkhUn7nh33Q  â€¢ Potentially NOT secure. Because the code is not available publicly. So it can not be review by the public. In other words, there is a risk of abuse. The software code is NOT open source. So weak security. And high risk of abuse by people with immature behaviors. Compare to https://DiasporaFoundation.org or https://Minds.com code which are open source and can be review by all.  â€¢ Owned by the for-profit corporation Sphere Network LTD. Which was recently created on 13 September 2017. With correspondence address at Otonomos (Uk) Ltd, 1 Fore Street, London, United Kingdom, EC2Y 9DT.  According to legal records, this for-profit corporation is controlled by only two people. They are Mr Andrew Khong and Mr Tuong Pham. 25 to 50% each. Both are residents of the USA. Source at https://beta.companieshouse.gov.uk/company/10961486  SS advertised that you are 100% in control of your content. That's false. As stated above, only two people have full controls of all your SS content, including censorship. Others have limited and partial decision-making control over your content.  This means that SS is primarily Money-Servant. Not People-Servant. In other words, Sphere is not owned by a not-for-profit community. Usually a corporation first priority is to hoard money. Not serve you and protect your privacy.  â€¢ Bad choice of name. Because there is already a Sphere Social network. That's gonna create confusion. The other network was founded in 2008 http://www.the-sphere.com  Wiki page at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Sphere_(social_network)  â€¢ Their primary front-end website at https://sphere.social seems to be partly powered by Wordpress. As you know SS back-end software is NOT open source. But SS use the open source project Wordpress for their primary front-end website. And do NOT give credit to the Wordpress community. SS's behaviors are awkward and self-centered.  â€¢ Not friendly with United States and Singapore citizens. If you try to register they greet you with a email asking you to confirm that youâ€™re not a citizen from those countries. Source at https://www.minds.com/media/803754670359556096 So the two owners of SS are citizens of USA, but they do not welcome other citizens of USA to use SS. That is really suspicious.  â€¢ Weak ethic. Because they tried to fool their user into believing that they are decentralized. This is false. They are primarily centralized.   How to not get scam?  A good start is to educate yourself. For example Corbett Report did an informative video about the nuances in the jargon. Such as blockchain, cryptocurrencies, and decentralize. Very good to watch. They are good and bad crypto currencies. Educate yourself to not get scam by the bad ones. Video at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FkhUn7nh33Q   I wrote my review as a volunteer. Which was not paid by Minds, Diaspora, or anyone.  - - - Are your tired of censorship with Facebook, YouTube, Twitter? You might be interested in the censorship-free and open source Minds at https://www.minds.com/register;referrer=Francewhoa

Author: Sphere_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: I feel like you are fundamentally misunderstanding what stage of development the company is in, and even what the purpose of an ICO is.  Sphere is not yet decentralized.  We are not trying to fool anyone about that.  We don't "claim we are decentralized because we offer a reward token"- that doesn't even make any sense.    We have a plan to put our social network- which is only in beta right now, so people can try it out and get used to the interface- on the blockchain and make it decentralized.  To do that, we need money.  To raise the money, we have created the Social Activity Token (SAT), a new form of digital currency designed to be used within Sphere â€“ to connect people online for advertising, finding, sharing, buying, selling, and trading products and services.     You write the words "for profit" as if they were some sort of crime.  Maybe someday this world will be a socialist paradise where all our governments are handing out that sweet universal income.  Alas, until that day we all still have to make a buck and feed our families,  and Sphere Social wants to share the profit with our users. We  will use the proceeds of the ICO to decentralize, improve, and add features to Sphere Social.   Hopefully, SAT will increase in value due to the features we add, since they will include ways to use the token. This would benefit both the company and the token holders.   Read our whitepaper- we will give users the choice of whether or not to sell their personal data and which parts to sell- and if they do sell it, they get a portion of any profit we make on it.  Open-source has its place, and it's certainly fun for those working on it, but there are benefits to not being open-source as well- namely fast, organized decision-making, and being able to pay the experts we need to make the code work, rather than just hoping someone will come along with the expertise needed.

Author: innovjack
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: To how many bits is SAT token divisible??? If it is not divisible it will not grow in value. Why??? Because it must not grow in value!!! Why???  Sphere social and it's market where people will be able to trade the gods using SAT tokens is a modern idea, therefore it has to and it will (if successful) compete with Facebook and Amazon one day which monthly turnover exceeds hundreds of millions of USD.  People on Amazon are able to buy/sell things for as little as 5 or even 1 USD or even less.  If sphere social and its market will be successful at the beginning, we may expect significant grow in value of the SAT token, but at the end if SAT token is not divisible or it is not divisible to enough "minisats", it will be disaster for the sphere social market (it will implode under its own success) because if 1 SAT token will be worth 5 USD for example, people will not be able to trade the gods below that amount.  There is tens of thousands of items on Amazon below 5 USD and less and this is BIG BIG share of Amazon turnover.  Preferably 1 SAT should be divisible to at least 10K "minisats", so one day when 1 SAT HOPEFULLY AND THEORETICALLY will be worth 1000 USD, the price of SAT token will not affect the market because 1 SAT =1000 USD divided by 10K minisats = 0.10 cent which will be the smallest amount tradeable on the market.  So, Iam asking again.  Is SAT token divisible or not??? If yes, then to how many "minisats" it is divisible???  One more question. I am unable to buy SAT tokens using credit card anymore. Can you explain to us what happened???   PS. don't laugh at 1 SAT= 1000 USD There is one billion SAT tokens but remember that unsold tokens will be burned. This project has HUGE HUGE potential providing developers will listen carefully to people's needs and tips.

Author: Shrinath
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: The underlying concept of how effective and profitable BTC is or would be, comes to you ONLY when you take the efforts to venture, study, gain knowledge and be properly educated on the subject. The media or anti-crypto-currency commentators that labels BTC as â€œscamâ€, â€œfraudulentâ€, â€œfakeâ€, â€œit doesn't existâ€ have either miserable failed for their own fault, or enjoy by warning clueless people about it being a potential "scam" or "bubble".  That traditional concepts that the old crowd have filled their brains with are not enough to understand the concepts of Crypto-currency. To them everything has to fall into a well established category. There can't be a new thing. They fail to accept a concept that creates a category of its own. This is the fallacy of old men. If you have been doing the same thing for 30 or 40 years and someone shows you that it can be done differently you take a defensive stance. When something is foreign or unfamiliar to them, they'd rather hate on it than choose to understand it. They are quick to judge without even trying to fully understand all about bitcoin. See, when you hold an asset, you either tend to be quiet about the associated FUD. When you hold nothing, you feel comfortable shouting FUD from the rooftops.  Let us take the initiative to continually be informed, be educated, and start to believe in its real concepts. Let us also inform and educate the new and needy and help them by being a part of the crypto-currency world. We need to let the internet-connected social media sites and the online news sites stay comfortably in their ignorance.

Author: KryptoTark
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: Yee man!    So many snowflakes in our society, no one can ever say or do or post something that may insult or make someone feel uncomfortable- this is such utter bullshit I have not enough words.  people need to learn to be confident about them selves, they cant "feel" so easily offended by every small or, for some big, disagreement.    Quote from: Yasemin on December 19, 2017, 07:54:12 AM    That is actually an interesting question. On almost every social media, you can report unacceptable content, like racist content. How will that work when the social media is decentralized??  There you have it, report button for criminal or unauthorized content. It could be put on a vote, wether to remove content or not. Say 1000 random and active platform users will get an invite to vote on some content. When first 100 have voted, and 75% says remove content then it will be taken down. The rest dont have to vote. There's many variations of how this could work

Author: Sphere_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: Quote from: Sphere_Official on December 19, 2017, 12:04:47 AM  Hello!  Thereâ€™s been a lot of talk about dividends on the thread.  Weâ€™d like to thank you for bringing this to our attention, because our marketing team actually used the wrong word.  â€œDividendsâ€ is not in our white paper, but it was on our website.  This was a serious error on our part and that word has been removed and replaced with â€œrewardsâ€.   We apologize deeply for the confusion.  As for the questions about how SAT will be utilized on our platform for profit, we have plans to have users spend SAT as a currency within our network. We will incentivize the use of SAT in many ways, including the marketplace to trade tokens for goods or services, paying users micro-transactions for ad clicks, and various types of social connections.  Users will also have the choice of remaining anonymous or getting paid by making decisions about what personal information and browsing data to sell.  Several other incentives are still being planned and developed and will be announced to the public at a later date.    I'd like to further clarify our plans to incentivize SAT so that it will increase in worth:  1. Social transactions - Make use of SAT to send money to another user. 2. We plan to integrate a Marketplace. - Users can simply create products or advertise services that their friends can see and purchase using SAT 3. Sphere Ad Platform - Users can easily advertise their products by displaying targeted ad pieces in the news feed. Users will have to pay for the advertising space. The platform will feature per-click and per -impression functions and cost will be deducted automatically from the seller's wallet. 4. Users will be getting paid if they allow a portion or all of their of their data to sold.

Author: Sphere_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: This is of course a subject that is very complicated and our solutions to it will need to keep evolving over the years.  Sphere advocates free speech, but some content simply must be prohibited.  We will be removing : Speech that would incite hatred or violence Advocating illegal activity Copyright trademark and patent Illegal contents such as child pornography  We can easily create a "Report This" button and incorporate it in our next release as suggested by KryptoTark to remove such content by community voting.

Author: Sphere_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: Hello!  Thereâ€™s been a lot of talk about dividends on the thread.  Weâ€™d like to thank you for bringing this to our attention, because our marketing team actually used the wrong word.  â€œDividendsâ€ is not in our white paper, but it was on our website.  This was a serious error on our part and that word has been removed and replaced with â€œrewardsâ€.   We apologize deeply for the confusion.  As for the questions about how SAT will be utilized on our platform for profit, we have plans to have users spend SAT as a currency within our network. We will incentivize the use of SAT in many ways, including the marketplace to trade tokens for goods or services, paying users micro-transactions for ad clicks, and various types of social connections.  Users will also have the choice of remaining anonymous or getting paid by making decisions about what personal information and browsing data to sell.  Several other incentives are still being planned and developed and will be announced to the public at a later date.

Author: Sphere_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: All information will be encrypted and stored on the blockchain which provides anonymous and secured structured data.  Recall the recent data breach of Equifax not too long ago. Some 150 million people were affected because their data was centralized and operated by a single company - Equifax. Because Sphere is decentralized, there will be no single point of failure and no single entity can dictate how things work. The funds raised from the ICO will partially go into further security improvements.  With Sphere, all of our user's personal browsing and search engine results are privately secured and stored away on anonymously on the blockchain. This way users can decide how their data can be used and be compensated.

Author: Sphere_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: Hello and Thank you for your responses and interest in Sphere.  We plan to focus on our own platform rather than "taking out" the competition. We're not trying to push old-style networks like Facebook and Twitter out of business.  Decentralized social networks are unquestionably better, but at the moment there's room for us all, and lots of overlap in users.  We have significantly different features from Steemit, which is more blog-based.  Sphere's social network will let users create groups to share interests, create campaigns and we are planning a marketplace that will use our Social Activity Tokens (SAT). We will implement new ideas suggested by our community and will constantly improve features to attract more users.  Right now we have an overwhelming amount of positive feedback. People are loving the project. They are looking forward to its success.

Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: Hello all!  Thank you for your interest in Sphere.  Yes we are getting issues where users are unable to login the app after they sign up from the referral link. To clear the confusion here, the referral link just makes an account for a Sphere wallet. It does not create an account for you on the app. To create an account on the App you can use this link here https://sphere.social/hello/users/register or you can click the "Create an account" link on the phone landing page when you first launch it.

Author: bitcoinmaster1
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: Also, genuinely asking this:  What makes this any different than Steemit?  Any smart investor will ask that. Steemit seems rather successful and given what your whitepaper says, it appears that this is very similar to Steemit but only differing in about 2-3 areas.  1) Using the ethereum chain to launch the platform 2) Having more liquidity in earned tokens with a debit card 3) Having a mobile application ready (even though ios is in beta) for use.  I see the last point being your biggest advantage over that network but the other two don't seem as differentiating. And that might not be enough of a difference to be regarded as something different. Steemit is already rolling so what's gonna make other people use this instead of Steemit (at least from what you can control) when trying to break away from Facebook or the likes?  Assuming you aren't a scam dev team, I know you don't want to be regarded as a clone, yet that will happen once someone familiar with crypto reads the whitepaper.  I ask as someone who's invested in the project already because that answer will determine if I hold long term or plan an exit within the next 12 months.  Thanks for the time reading this!

Author: Sphere_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: Thank you for your interest in Sphere. Steemit is more like a content aggregation platform where users post contents, news, etc and others vote and share. Sphere is more mainstream like Facebook but we are going to live on the blockchain. Our users will have control over their own privacy unlike Steemit or Facebook. We see this as an advantage over other social network sites. What we needed most right now is more exposure to the general public.

Author: Sphere_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: It's best practice to tie ETH = SAT Since ETH fluctuates so fast, by the time of the sale, the price would have gone up. Our smart contract is written with ETH = SAT We based our smart contract on 1 ETH = 7000 SAT Right now it's 1 SAT = around 5 cents USD By the time the sale happens, the value of the tokens you hold will be, 1 ETH - 7000 SAT. So early investors actually get a discount during the presale.

Author: Sphere_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: www.sphere.social  Web | Whitepaper | Twitter | Facebook | Reddit | Instagram | Medium | Pinterest | YouTube | GitHub | Telegram | ANN ICO Google App | iOS App WHITEPAPER | ONEPAGER   ANNOUNCEMENT OFFICIAL SAT EXCHANGE LISTING:   https://exrates.me/dashboard (trading pairs SAT/BTC, SAT/ETH, SAT/USD)  https://www.ooobtc.com/trading?coin=sat&current=btc  https://yobit.net/en/trade/SAT/BTC  https://yobit.net/en/trade/SAT/ETH  https://yobit.net/en/trade/SAT/DOGE  https://yobit.net/en/trade/SAT/USD  https://yobit.net/en/trade/SAT/RUR  https://idex.market/eth/sat2  More Exchange listing very soon.   Download Our App!      ANN Link Join Our Bounty Program! | Join Our Signature Program! | Join Our Affiliate Program!        We Proudly Bring You Sphere Social Network    We're thrilled to announce the imminent birth of our Social Activity Token (SAT), scheduled for ICO on 12 February 2018 21:00 UTC to 9 April 2018 21:00 UTC  Sphere, a new and innovative decentralized social network, is built on the idea that privacy, company transparency, and data security should be the fundamental building blocks of every social platform.  Sphere is an already existing product on the Google Play Store and the Apple App Store.  So far 400,000+ members have joined our program and that number is expected to continue rising.  No one should miss out on this!   The Sphere Network is powered by the Social Activity Token (SAT)  Social Activity Token (SAT) connects businesses and people. SATs are used throughout the system to facilitate transactions within the decentralized social network. SAT can be maintained in an ERC20 compliant Ethereum wallet.  SAT will be traded at 1 SAT = $0.14 USD during the Initial Coin Offering.  The ICO is for a limited time only and will end once all tokens have been allocated to our users. Any and all remaining unsold tokens will be burned to eliminate oversupply.    SAT Crowdsale (ICO) Details  Name of Token: Social Activity Token  Symbol: SAT    Standard: ERC20 Standard    Decimals: 8    Role of Token: Utility Token.  Use of Token: Purchasing goods and services on the Sphere Social media platform    Total supply: 1,000,000,000 SAT  Available token for sale: 650,000,000 (65% of supply)    Emission: All unsold and unallocated tokens will be destroyed, and additional release of tokens will not be possible    Period of Sale: 12 February 2018 UTC 21:00 to 9 April 2018 UTC 21:00    Cost of 1 SAT: $0.14  Softcap/Minimum Goal: $1.5 million â€“ softcap goal reached  Hardcap/Maximum Goal: $40 million  Accepted currencies: Ethereum, Bitcoin, Litecoin, Dogecoin, Fiat  Smart Contract Source: https://github.com/spheresocial/SAT_Smart_Contract/blob/master/SocialActivityToken_Smart_Contract.sol  Smart Contract Address: 0xc56b13ebbCFfa67cFb7979b900b736b3fb480D78  Smart Contract Audit: https://audit.jesbus.com/social_activity_token_audit.pdf    More Promotions  â†’NEW $$$$$ Sign up for Sphere Affiliate Program. Make extra $$$ while promoting Sphere $$$$$  https://sphere.social/affiliate  â†’ Refer your friends and you can earn extra SAT! Each referral who joins will ensure that you receive 20 SAT. You can get your own referral link by signing up at www.sphere.social  â†’ Read our White Paper at https://sphere.social/wpcontent/uploads/2017/12/Sphere_Whitepaper_v1.7.4.pdf  â†’ Sign Up for the Promotion at https://sphere.social/  Limited time offer: Earn 20 SAT just for signing up at our website!  Bounty Program Check out our bounty thread below: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2437617.0    SPHERE SOCIAL MISSION  THE PROBLEM  Your online activity and your social media presence contribute to billion-dollar industries.  Your data is sold by them, many times without your permission, knowledge, or consent.  Don't you think you should be entitled to better privacy protection?  Don't you think you should be entitled to a portion of the riches made from your data?  We do! And we believe it's finally time to stand up to these companies and take back the Internet!  THE SOLUTION  Sphere was built on the idea that privacy, company transparency, and data security should be the fundamental building block of every social platform. We believe that the millions those corporations are making from your data doesn't belong to them, it belongs to you.  We are creating a decentralized social network, separate from those corporations, that allows exactly that. You have a say, you get compensated, and above all you take back the power with every connection and every interaction.    INTERVIEW WITH OMAR CRYPT0 AT BLOCKCON 2017 https://youtu.be/yCpTWjEn1mo      Feel free to join our conversations on: Twitter: https://twitter.com/SphereOfficial1 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SphereSocialNetwork Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/SphereSocial Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sphereofficial1/ Medium: https://medium.com/@sphereofficial Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/sphereofficial/ Steemit: https://steemit.com/@sphereofficial Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tXmpURw0cIo Telegram: https://t.me/sphere_official1  Wholesale discounts wholesale@sphere.social  Live Help 24/7 on our Telegram: https://t.me/sphere_official1       Download our App!    Sphere is now available on Google Play.    Sphere is available on the App Store.

Author: Sphere_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] Sphere - Decentralized Social Networking >200,000 users
Body: Thank you for all your responses. We will try to address some of the frequently asked questions below:  Key Dates - Beta Apps Launched October, 2017 - already done - ICO Will Start on February 12th, 2018.    Do you have a bounty program?  Yes, we do.  Please go to our bounty program thread at:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2437617   How long will the referral program be active for?  The referral program will be active until announced otherwise.  The sign up bonus and referral bonus will decrease over time until the date of the ICO.   Questions about caps, tokens, etc?  Regarding the cap, it will be capped. One billion tokens will be generated.  No tokens will be generated beyond the ones sold at the ICO. Any unsold tokens will be burned.  For more information about token sale, refer to Sphere whitepaper:  https://sphere.social/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/Sphere_Whitepaper_v1.7.4.pdf   What are the benefits of holding SAT tokens?  The benefits are described on the main website:  https://sphere.social and in the whitepaper:  https://sphere.social/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/Sphere_Whitepaper_v1.7.4.pdf   How does your referral system count my referrals?  Referred users would need to verify their email accounts.   I'm getting an â€œAccount Already In Useâ€ error when trying to sign up at https://sphere.social?  This means your IP has already been used. We only allow one registration per IP to prevent spam registrations and system abuse.
